title: Sales Representative
description: Elite Solutions Inc. is seeking a motivated and results-driven Sales Representative to join our dynamic sales team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for identifying customer needs, promoting our products/services, and closing sales.
responsibilities: Identify and reach out to potential clients through cold calls, emails, and networking.
Understand customer needs and recommend appropriate products or services.
Develop and maintain strong relationships with new and existing clients.
Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets.
Prepare and deliver professional presentations to clients.
Collaborate with the marketing team to develop strategies for increasing sales.
Maintain accurate records of sales activities and customer interactions in CRM.
requirements: Proven experience as a Sales Representative or similar role.
Ability to understand customer needs and provide appropriate solutions.
Self-motivated and goal-oriented with a results-driven approach.
Familiarity with CRM software (e.g., Salesforce) is a plus.
Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field preferred.
benefits: Competitive base salary with uncapped commission structure.
Generous paid time off (PTO) and holidays.
Ongoing training and career development opportunities.
